item.description:
Legends tell of a battle horn that can summon aid enough to turn the tide of any battle, and the kingdom is in desperate need of aid right now. Unable to spare an army, the king has called upon small groups of loyal adventurers to undertake the dangerous mission and recover the relic before the castle falls. But is the horn even real? And even if it is, could such a potent artifact stay hidden for so long without lethal danger keeping treasure hunters at bay? Join a group of dedicated heroes seeking the artifact in this 3 hour long D&D adventure. Pre-generated characters will be available.

Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember.
item.name: Dungeons & Dragons Night: The Horn Resounding
